extractFactDictList.question: What is the role of saliva in maintaining oral health?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Saliva also plays an important role in maintaining oral health. It helps to neutralize acids in the mouth, preventing tooth decay and gum disease. It also contains antibodies that help to protect the mouth from infection.
